content: How would Mickey Mouse celebrate his 100th birthday?

Mickey Mouse, one of the most iconic characters in animation history, was created by Walt Disney and Ub Iwerks in 1928. To celebrate his 100th birthday, there would likely be a series of global events, special editions of merchandise, and possibly a new film or television special. Disney parks around the world might have special parades, fireworks, and themed attractions. Additionally, there could be collaborations with other brands, limited edition products, and possibly a documentary or retrospective on Mickey's impact on popular culture.
